mapper.insert: insert into hope_data (hope_data_seq, regi_day, product_id, product_img, product_link, product_title, hope_price, product_flag, user_id) values (hope_data_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'),#{productID},#{productImg},#{productLink},#{productTitle},#{hopePrice},0,#{userID})
insert into lprice_per_day (lpd_seq, lprice, lprice_upday, product_type, hope_data_seq) values (lpd_seq.nextval, #{lprice}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{productType}, #{hopeDataSeq})
mapper.select: select product_id from hope_data where user_id=#{userID} and product_id=#{productID} and product_flag=0

select h.product_id, h.product_title, h.product_img, h.product_link, l.lprice from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday

select h.product_id, h.product_id, h.product_title, h.product_img, h.product_link, l.lprice from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday
mapper.update: update hope_data set hope_price = #{hopePrice} where product_id = #{productID} and user_id= #{userID} and product_flag=0
update hope_data set product_flag=1 where product_id=#{productID} and user_id=#{userID}
update hope_data set product_flag=1 where user_id=#{userID}
mapper.select: select A.lprice from (select lprice from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and product_id=#{productID} and user_id=#{userID} order by lprice_upday) A where rownum=1

select E.product_id, E.product_img, E.product_link, E.product_title, E.hope_price, E.lprice, regi_day from (select rownum as rnum, A.product_id, A.product_img, A.product_link, A.product_title, A.hope_price, A.lprice, to_char(A.regi_day, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regi_day from (select h.product_id, h.product_img, h.product_link, h.product_title, h.hope_price, l.lprice, h.regi_day from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and h.product_flag=0 and h.user_id=#{userID} and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday order by h.regi_day) A) E where rnum > #{minRowNum} and rnum <= #{maxRowNum}

select E.product_id, E.product_img, E.product_link, E.product_title, E.hope_price, E.lprice, regi_day from (select rownum as rnum, A.product_id, A.product_img, A.product_link, A.product_title, A.hope_price, A.lprice, to_char(A.regi_day, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regi_day from (select h.product_id, h.product_img, h.product_link, h.product_title, h.hope_price, l.lprice, h.regi_day from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and h.product_flag=0 and h.user_id=#{userID} and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday order by h.regi_day desc) A) E where rnum > #{minRowNum} and rnum <= #{maxRowNum}

select E.product_id, E.product_img, E.product_link, E.product_title, E.hope_price, E.lprice, regi_day from (select rownum as rnum, A.product_id, A.product_img, A.product_link, A.product_title, A.hope_price, A.lprice, to_char(A.regi_day, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regi_day from (select h.product_id, h.product_img, h.product_link, h.product_title, h.hope_price, l.lprice, h.regi_day from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and h.product_flag=0 and h.user_id=#{userID} and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday order by l.lprice) A) E where rnum > #{minRowNum} and rnum <= #{maxRowNum}

select E.product_id, E.product_img, E.product_link, E.product_title, E.hope_price, E.lprice, regi_day from (select rownum as rnum, A.product_id, A.product_img, A.product_link, A.product_title, A.hope_price, A.lprice, to_char(A.regi_day, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regi_day from (select h.product_id, h.product_img, h.product_link, h.product_title, h.hope_price, l.lprice, h.regi_day from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and h.product_flag=0 and h.user_id=#{userID} and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday order by h.hope_price) A) E where rnum > #{minRowNum} and rnum <= #{maxRowNum}

select lprice, to_char(lprice_upday, 'MM/DD') as lprice_upday from hope_data h, lprice_per_day l where h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and product_id=#{productID} and user_id=#{userID} and product_flag=0 order by l.lprice_upday
select count(*) as total_cnt from hope_data where user_id=#{userID} and product_flag=0

select A.user_id, A.phone, A.alarm, A.product_title, A.nickname, A.product_link, A.hope_price from (select h.hope_price, h.product_title, h.product_link, l.lprice, u.nickname, u.user_id, u.phone, u.alarm from user_data u, lprice_per_day l, hope_data h where product_id=#{productID} and product_flag=0 and h.hope_data_seq=l.hope_data_seq and u.user_id=h.user_id and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')=l.lprice_upday) A where A.hope_price >= A.lprice
select hope_data_seq from hope_data where user_id=#{userID} and product_id=#{productID} and product_flag=0
